channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- jQuery Reply to Comment
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- jQuery Reply to Comment

item.title: CVE-2021-24543|2024-08-03T19:35:19.976Z -- unknown -- jquery%20reply%20to%20comment
item.description: The jQuery Reply to Comment WordPress plugin through 1.31 does not have any CSRF check when saving its settings, nor sanitise or escape its 'Quote String' and 'Reply String' settings before outputting them in Comments, leading to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue.
